articles.content: Transmission electron microscope images of laboratory powder samples. Clockwise from top left, fullerene soot, black carbon aggregate from vehicle exhaust, Hematite-TD and Hematite-KJ. Credit: 2023 M… [+4734 chars]

articles.title: ULA prepares for Vulcan Centaur rocket launch in July - WKMG News 6 ClickOrlando
articles.description: United Launch Alliance started testing on the Vulcan Centaur rocket Friday from the launch pad at Cape Canaveral, the space company’s CEO said in a tweet.

articles.title: Space Station Science Highlights: Week of May 8, 2023 - NASA
articles.description: Crew members aboard the International Space Station conducted scientific investigations during the week of May 8 that included monitoring how spaceflight affects immune function, testing a student-designed camera mount, and assessing a platform for automated …
